nodes.name: AccountState
AccountState

devdoc.author: Authereum Labs, Inc.
devdoc.details: This contract holds the state variables used by the account contracts.This exists as the main contract to hold state. This contract is inheritedby Account.sol, which will not care about state as long as it inheritsAccountState.sol. Any state variable additions will be made to the variousversions of AccountStateVX that this contract will inherit.
devdoc.title: AccountState
